mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (password, email, name, phone, address, buildingManagementNum) VALUES(#{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{buildingManagementNum})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM user WHERE email = #{email}) as isHave;
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET address = #{address}, buildingManagementNum = #{buildingManagementNum} where id = #{id};
